projects.title: ViaLeads
projects.description: ViaLeads is a 100% cloud-based solution that combines multiple predictive dialers and a scripting tool designed for call centers. It automates your inbound and outbound call campaigns, provides real-time production monitoring, and offers customizable supervision screens. ViaLeads is equipped with powerful call engines, including preview, progressive, predictive, and click-to-call. It also offers on-demand, scheduled, or random recording, campaign reports, and detailed statistics by agent, group, service, hour, day, and month.
projects.role: I began my journey at ViaLeads as a Full Stack developer, but my skills and expertise led me to become the Front-End lead for the project. One of the major challenges I faced while working on ViaLeads was integrating new features on top of an existing database. Another challenge was developing the Auto Mode feature that distributes tasks to agents based on various factors such as scheduling, priority, and recall. Lastly, creating dynamic scripts and forms that adapt to the client's phone call responses was also a complex task that I overcame through my strong problem-solving skills.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
